name: ltx-2-i2v
description: 使用LTX-2模型进行图片转视频，根据图片和提示词生成高质量视频

prompt.default:
An elegant Chinese woman was running swiftly through a peaceful garden bathed in the lingering glow of the setting sun. The garden, now soaked by the rain, appeared exceptionally serene in the twilight. She was wearing a flowing cheongsam with exquisite embroidery and held a transparent paper umbrella. Raindrops fell one by one. The lights were soft, with a cinematic quality, and the scene presented a slight slow-motion effect, giving a slightly impressionist visual effect.
Sound effect: Only the sound of rain.

validation.description: 生成提示词，描述要生成的视频内容

negative_prompt.default: blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, has subtitles, has music
